dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
L. Shen
L. Tian
S. Wang
J. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset for person re-identification containing 1,501 identities with 32,368 pedestrian images captured by six cameras. It provides two types of images: cropped and automatically detected by DPM.
dcterms:title: Market1501

dcterms:creator: W. Li
R. Zhao
T. Xiao
X. Wang
dcterms:description: A dataset for person re-identification containing 1,360 identities with 13,164 pedestrian images captured by six cameras. It provides two types of annotations: manually annotated bounding boxes and bounding boxes detected using DPM.
dcterms:title: CUHK03

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng
Z. Bie
Y. Sun
J. Wang
C. Su
S. Wang
Q. Tian
dcterms:description: A large-scale sequence-based dataset for person re-identification containing 1,261 identities with 20,478 tracklets and 1,191,003 bounding boxes. It is captured by multiple cameras and provides tracklets for sequence-based analysis.
dcterms:title: MARS
